Message:
each and every one of them
insulted and sneered at me.

I was innocent...
yet I couldn’t defend myself.
I didn’t know what to do.

Then, that recruit
stepped out from the room.

Thank goodness, she’s here...!
But, the relief only lasted
a moment.

She looked at me with the same
scornful eyes as everyone else,
and laughed.

I see...
So that’s how it is.

This commotion was a trap,
plotted by everyone to frame me.

She was the only one
I truly trusted...

But in the end, she, too,
was laughing behind my back,

What’s justice...?
What should I strive for...?
